argument.description: When the collation of the database does not contain the supplementary character (SC) flag, this is a positive whole number from 0 through 65535 (0 through 0xFFFF). If a value outside this range is specified, NULL is returned. For more information about supplementary characters, see Collation and Unicode Support.

returnType: nchar(1) when the default database collation does not support supplementary characters.
description: Returns the Unicode character with the specified integer code, as defined by the Unicode standard.
